response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the ham hocks into the stockpot. Now, we need to cook the ham hocks in the stockpot.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hocks out of the fridge
(3) Move to the oven
(4) Take the stockpot from the oven
(5) Put the ham hocks into the stockpot
(6) Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
    stockpot = registry(env,"stockpot_81")
    cook(robot, stockpot)
    donothing(env)
